title: Looking for players High Silver/Gold
body:
Im Gold 5 play adc/jg
Friend is Silver 1 plays top/mid
Add me in game

replies.body:
Yo, I'm happy if you'd throw me into a norm to test me out, but I'm Silver 5, mainly play support in ranked, Thresh, Morgana, Blitz, etc. Looking for a solid team to climb and improve with. 

I'm pretty easygoing and can take criticism. Memes are essential.
